DOC.brief_summary: RYTHMIC ( Réseau tumeurs THYMiques et Cancer ) French nationwide network TET objective territorial coverage regional expert center systematic discussion patient management national tumor board .
DOC.brief_title: French National Observatory Patients With Thymic Epithelial Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: RYTHMIC ( Réseau tumeurs THYMiques et Cancer ) nationwide network TET appoint 2012 French National Cancer Institute . The objective network management clinical tumor board central pathologic review case . RYTHMIC Tumor Board base initial histopathological diagnosis . RYTHMIC comprehensive tool research : - improve management patient - monitor dedicated action - screen patient future translational clinical trial
